5D72A43B.Line1.EDC71: Merrik, I know you hate snakes, but there’s gold to be made. I need you to go search the ruins for a book called “Compendium Maleficarum.”

F7671DBD.Line3.EDC71:
If you find it, I’ve got a buyer who’ll pay a king’s ransom and you’ll never have to see another snake for as long as you live.
-Julianus
